cardsInfo.title: Geographical Lemmas
cardsInfo.text: Geographical exploration of Lemmas, with filtering options (text, part of speech and year) enabled to highlight only certain words in the map.

cardsInfo.title: Word-Source Relations
cardsInfo.text: Geographical exploration of Lemmas, including filtering and relations between words based on the source they appear in when clicking on any of them.

cardsInfo.title: Lemma Context Navigation
cardsInfo.text: Geographical exploration of Lemmas, with filtering options (text, part of speech and year) enabled to highlight only certain words in the map.

cardsInfo.title: Raw Questionnaire Exploration
cardsInfo.text: Generate dynamic HTML based hierarchies with Questionnaires that hold Questions that reference Lemmas.

cardsInfo.title: Hierarchical Questionnaire Tree
cardsInfo.text: Dynamic tree generation of Questionnaire hierarchies based on the content matching searches.

cardsInfo.title: Circle Packed Questionnaires
cardsInfo.text: Questionnaire exploration through a hierarchy of packed circles which highlight relations between questions and lemmas.

cardsInfo.title: Bedeutung Prototype.
cardsInfo.text: This is a prototype to explore the BD field

cardsInfo.title: RDF Plants Explorer
cardsInfo.text: Scientific and Common Plant name explorer based on RDF data and connected to Europeana.
